summary: Brand new spigot model and textures
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Spigot HD[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Credits[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - mesh, textures
his BATYA - a toast to this mod success

[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod replaces the standard spigot visual with a new detailed model with somewhat hi-res textures. This [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo_Mew_Mew]new-mew[/url] spigot cannot be improved, enchanted or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rothschild_family]profitably[/url] sold, but at least looks [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lie]much better[/url] than before (I hope so).


[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]

author: Ronnie Magnum
